recipe.ingredients: - carrots: 4 medium - celery stalks: 4 - apples (green or red): 2 medium - lemon juice: 1 tablespoon - fresh ginger (optional): 1 inch piece
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Wash all the vegetables and fruits thoroughly. Peel the carrots and ginger, and core the apples. 2. Juice Ingredients: Using a juicer, feed carrots, celery stalks, apples, and ginger (if using) into the juicer. Alternate between the types of produce to ensure maximum juice extraction. 3. Add Lemon: Stir in the tablespoon of lemon juice into the freshly extracted juice. This adds a vibrant, tangy taste and helps preserve the color. 4. Serve Immediately: Pour the juice into glasses and serve immediately to enjoy the maximum nutritional benefits. If desired, you can chill the juice for about 30 minutes before serving.
